pageContext.claim: “Our relationship with India, and again with China and with Japan and with so many countries, is better than it's ever been. Literally better than it's ever been.”
pageContext.analysis: In typical Trumpian fashion, he claims relations have never been better with many other countries, but in fact he has shaken many relationships with many key allies. There is little basis to claim a better relationship between the U.S. and India, China and Japan. He engaged in a costly trade war with China.
